title: How was Incident NITK 2020? - Quora
tags: National Institute of Technology Karnataka, Surathkal

response.answer_text: How was Incident NITK 2020? For those like myself that this means nothing for, NITK or National Institute of Technology Karnataka, is a public engineering university at Surathkal, Mangalore, Karnataka, India. The “Incident” was a festival of dance, music and other things. Incident, NITK Surathkal It would help if the OP was not be so obscure when asking the question - it would save a lot of people time by not having to Google it.
